name: @source4society/SCEPTER-service-template
description: Base template used for creating services.
author: Source4Society.Org

scripts.build: node ./config/initialize.js && powershell rm -Recurse -Force ./build/node_modules; rm ./build/*.js; rm ./build/*.yml; rm ./build/*.json; rm ./build/*.lock; cp ./src/handler.js ./build/handler.js; cp ./package.json ./build/; uglifyjs ./src/service.js -o ./build/service.js; cp ./config/service_name.yml ./build/service_name.yml; cd ./build/; yarn install --production
